901 Island Park Dr Suite A, Daniel Island, SC
map marker pin A Destination 
Welcome home to Ristorante Lidi

Ristorante LIDI was inspired by the world’s great Italian family restaurants known for simple, authentic dishes in intimate contemporary settings. A Ristorante LIDI experience incorporates the area’s unique island lifestyle, ease of access, and top-shelf service. We live and work here, and strive to make a positive contribution to the neighborhood’s culture and community
Read more about us Parties 
Book your next party with us!

Ristorante LIDI would be honored to provide our services for your next event. Each event is bespoke to your tastes and needs, to provide the best experience possible for you and your guests.
Parties book now

Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Maria F:

This restaurant never disappoints, both in service, and food quality! I absolutely love their pizza (home made crust!) we have gone multiple times, and everything has been outstanding. I love their gnoqui.

Review by - Yelp

Kelly F:

Great place for lunch. We had the spaghetti and meatball ($8) and chicken park ($10). Both were very good. Nice atmosphere and clean. Reasonable prices. I'll be back. Ravioli, soup and salad were great.

Review by - Yelp

Gerry R:

We have been here from NYC FOR 18 months and have been underwhelmed with the Italian food here Well tonight we "came home" and had an excellent meal served by a Pro! Bravo LIDI WE will be back!!!

Review by - Yelp

Tiffany C:

This is our favorite Italian spot in Charleston. Everything is made from scratch and cooked to perfection. The braised veal short ribs are to die for. Stuffed mushrooms, calamari, and sausage and pea fettuccine Alfredo are a must. And Don't forget the espresso martini for dessert! You won't regret visiting LIDI.

Review by - Yelp

Stephanie D:

Dropped by after a concert for a app and drink. Food was delicious and the drinks were on point! Quentin and Cody were great. Cozy atmosphere and the staff were energetic and professional! We will certainly be back!
